captions.text:
The playing style of the Hypervenom is deadly
agility, and Neymar is the face of it.

Neymar is the player that captures this playing style
in the best possible way.

We had a chance  to sit down with him in 2012 in Santos. Among
other things that we were discussing he told

us a story that when he was 12 he used to
spraypaint his boots before every game in

gold because he couldn't buy gold boots anywhere
but he really wanted them. We took that little

inspiration and decided to do something special
for him for this summer in Brasil.

Hypervenom is designed for the player that plays with
deadly agility he is a very intuitive player,

he uses his instinct to make a difference.
On the pitch, usually it's the player that

is playing in a very crowded space so we really
had to deliver something that provides him
with the best possible advantage on pitch.
What that means for Hypervenom is a clean surface

for strike very consistent touch all
over the upper and a plate that works for

these agile movements where a player changes
direction very quickly.

The decision to make a gold boot was easy but the execution was
difficult because as we learnt, gold is a

very difficult color to execute. So a lot
of rounds went into it a lot of different

finishes which we often revised with Neymar,
last time in Barcelona a few months ago. We're
looking into what is the right shade of gold.
Well what he did say about spraypainting his

boots is that it didn't last very long, so
by the end of the game the gold was off. This

time, I'm sure the gold will stay until the
end.

title: Nike Hypervenom: Neymar Júnior's golden dream
